SEARCH
Package AntColonyOpt

Interface AntInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ant
public interface AntInterface
The decision to create this java class was made in such a way that in the future, if someone wants to change the way the Ant class is implemented, they can do it by modifying only the necessary lines of code, while the rest of the code will remain intact.
